title: Replace BullBoost Performance banner image with newly uploaded logo

requirements.text: Save the newly uploaded BullBoost Performance logo image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png, replacing the existing file at that path. Update the BullBoost banner in frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx to display this new image. The banner must remain a clickable anchor tag linking to https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer', displayed alongside the existing eBay and Enjuku Racing sponsor banners in the horizontal sponsor row.

quotes: Fix the bull boost image and use this one instead

acceptanceCriteria: The new BullBoost Performance logo (white text on black background, 1600x900 source) is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png
The BullBoost banner in Layout.tsx renders the new image instead of the old one
Clicking the BullBoost banner opens https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu in a new tab
The banner row still displays all three sponsor banners (eBay, BullBoost, Enjuku Racing) side-by-side
The banner is styled consistently with the app's dark automotive theme

constraints: The BullBoost affiliate link https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu must not be changed
The existing eBay and Enjuku Racing banners must not be affected
nonGoals: Changing the layout or position of the sponsor banner row

edits: Crop and resize the uploaded Bull Boost Performance logo (black background, white script 'Bull Boost' + 'PERFORMANCE' text) to banner dimensions (bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png > bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png)
